casebody.data:
CROCKER, et al.
v.
ROETHLING, et al. No. 374PA07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 12, 2007. Joe McLeod, William W. Aycock, Jr., Wade E. Byrd, Fayetteville, for Crocker. Samuel G. Thompson, William Moss, Raleigh, for Roethling & Clinic.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of December 2007 by NCATL for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of December 2007."
